article_title: Everything You Need to Know About Quibi
article_description: Quibi  a new streaming service from Jeffery Katzenberg  founder and CEO of Dreamworks  officially launched today  Unlike most streaming services that are meant to be watched on your television  Quibi is designed to be watched primarily on your mobile phone  R
